extendedInfo.description: âââââ 35 million people love â¤PicCollageâ¤ PicCollage lets you instantly arrange your photos into frames - or get creative with freeform collages, cutouts, filters, borders, stickers, and text. Your friends will be amazed with what you can create. It's like photoshop with your fingers!"Whether you're 6 or 106, you'll find the free Pic Collage app an excellent way to dress up your photo collection and share your handiwork." - USA TodayPicCollage is a Top 10 Photo App in the US, UK, Japan and many other countries!Awesome features:* Import photos from your photo gallery, Facebook and Google image search* Simple touch gestures to rotate, resize, flick to delete* Double-tap an image to edit photo, clip photo, adjust borders* Clip photos by outlining the area you want with your finger * Lots of fun backgrounds and stickers to choose from!Simple and intuitive touch gestures: - Tap to add photos and move them to front - Resize photos by stretching or pinching them - Rotate them with two fingers - Flick the photo to delete it- Add text in various fonts and colors- Tap-and-hold to move images to the back of the collage- Double-tap an image to clip, edit, add photo filter effects, or draw! "You can impress your mother, brag to your co-workers, and make your vacation look even better than it really was, all before you pack your suitcase to return home ... It could be the fastest way you'll ever find to organize a batch of photos ... Also makes gorgeous emails and can turn your image into a real postcard." - LA Times"Superb!! It's good at editing. And when i'm lazy to upload my pics one by one,i can squeeze everything in one page.."- Mamat Helmi"Awesome! Simply fantastic!!!! Exactly what I needed!!!!"- Alexa Lepe"I never rate or comment about apps but this is one is by far my favorite...."- Deidrah TrujilloPicCollage is fast, fun and simple. It's the best way to create awesome collages of your friends and favorite celebrities, with stickers, text, and web search! When you're done, share your collages on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Tumblr or email.  Check out the Featured collages, and see all the awesome collages created for One Direction, Harry Styles, Liam Payne, Niall Horan, Zayn Malik, Justin Bieber, Katy Perry, Selena Gomez, Hello Kitty, Nikki Minaj, Carrie Underwood, Taylor Swift, AKB48, Disney, Hearts, Love, Flowers, Pink, Cats, Puppies, Kittens, Domo, Gangnam Style, Rage Comics, Happy Birthday and many more of your favorite products, bands and celebrities.  Check our these featured collages and share them to Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and Tumblr!You can also see the collages featured on our website http://pic-collage.com and on Pinterest: http://pinterest.com/piccollage"It could be the fastest way you'll ever find to organize a batch of photos." - San Jose Mercury News"è¤æ°ã®åçãèªå¨ã«éç½®ãã¦ã³ã©ã¼ã¸ã¥ãä½ããã¢ããªãPicCollage åçã³ã©ã¼ã¸ã¥ããç¡æã¨ã¯æããªãæ©è½ã®åå®ã¶ãã§ãæç¨èã®å¤ã1æ¬ã ã" - æ¥æ¬çµæ¸æ°èHave fun with "Pic Collage"!   It's your scrapbook on-the-go.It's the canvas for your life.Don't miss the featured collages in Pic Collage, especially all the creative collages, and One Direction and Justin Bieber fan collages."Pic Collage" is also available in iTunes, Amazon App Store, and KDDI's au smartpass.PicCollage(TM) and "Pic Collage" are trademarks of Cardinal Blue Software.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I fixed the package installer problem and it works great love it so much such an awesome app.  No problems at all.

reviews.title: Greatest App ever!!!!
reviews.comment: Out all the picture collage making apps this is by far the best! I only wish there were more back grounds and stamps, I make a lot of collages so it\'d be great if their were a lot more :)
